alert.note: Alert for Northwest Carter; Southeast Carter; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 1:23PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN UNICOI AND SOUTHWESTERN CARTER COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM EDT... At 223 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Banner Hill, or near Erwin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Elizabethton, Erwin, Banner Hill, Pine Crest, Central, Unicoi, Milligan College, and Limestone Cove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
